contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox German location |Name = Erxleben |Art = Stadtteil |Town = [[Osterburg (Altmark)]] |image_photo = |Wappen = Wappen Erxleben.svg |lat_deg = 52 |lat_min = 45 |lat_sec = |lon_deg = 11 |lon_min = 46 |lon_sec = |Lageplan = |Bundesland = Sachsen-Anhalt |Landkreis = Stendal |Höhe = 33 |Fläche = 20.99 |Einwohner = 499 |Stand = 2006-12-31 |PLZ = 39606 |Vorwahl = 03937 |Kfz = SDL |Adresse-Verband = Ernst-Thälmann-Str. 10<br />39606 Osterburg (Altmark) |Website = [http://www.osterburg.de/ www.osterburg.de] }} '''Erxleben''' is a village and a former municipality in the [[Stendal (district)|district of Stendal]], in [[Saxony-Anhalt]], [[Germany]]. Since 1 July 2009, it is part of the town [[Osterburg (Altmark)]]. [[Category:Villages in Saxony-Anhalt]] {{Stendal-geo-stub}}
